results.content: This course does not live up to the title. The author talks about basic typescript only. He does not cover the part where you could compile the code (bundle) to .js file, In addition I expected to learn a little about tsconfig.json as it important for any TypeScript based project.

response.content:
Dear Yash, 

This is not TypeScript course. TypeScript part was given as a bonus to learners. Moreover, compiling the TypeScript with Deno is given throughout the whole course. I suggest you to read course description carefully and to watch lectures once again.
response.content_html:
Dear Yash,

results.content_html: This course does not live up to the title. The author talks about basic typescript only. He does not cover the part where you could compile the code (bundle) to .js file, In addition I expected to learn a little about tsconfig.json as it important for any TypeScript based project.

results.content:
The course is interesting but I feel I'm not learning more than from the get started tutorial from the official documentation
Also the course is a bit too slow-paced at times (typically, when the instructor made a typo and then takes time to wonder what's wrong and eventually fix it, this could be sped up or even cut out completely).
results.content_html:

response.content: Thank for the feedback! I really appreciate that!
